intro: Psychotria rambouensis, commonly known as the Rambouant Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of Africa, particularly the Democratic Republic of the Congo. The plant is characterized by its simple, opposite leaves and produces small, clustered white or pale green flowers. It is often found in moist, shaded forest environments. The fruit is a small capsule that contains several seeds.
